title: G & M Co. Recalls Beef Products Due To Possible E. Coli O157:H7 Contamination
summary: WASHINGTON, June 14, 2016 G & M Co., a Newark, N.J. establishment, is recalling approximately 3,586 pounds of beef products that may be contaminated with E. coli O157:H7, the U.S. Department of Agricultures Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS) announced today.The bulk beef cuts and...
